title: Lucky Pennies
name: Lucky Pennies
description:
A Map by Chippy

Found a Lucky Penny? Add it to the map. Map of all the lucky pennies, and maybe some pattern might emerge. 
Optional: describe about how lucky the day was.
Optional: post picture of the penny.


&lt;a href=&quot;http://nasw.org/users/twoharts/pennyhome.html&quot;&gt;Lucky Penny Web&lt;/a&gt;

properties.name: Chicago/Franklin El Station
properties.description: Posted by Deb22.08.07 Found this lucky one on the steps up to the train platform, Loop side. Photographed it on the bench once I arrived at the top of the stairs. Wish I had been ready to photograph it in the wild, so to speak.

properties.name: Cooking & Hospitality Institute of Chicago
properties.description: Posted by Deb27.8.07 - Found this lucky penny in the parking lot at 361 W. Chestnut

properties.name: Found an uncommon US penny here
properties.description: Posted by ChippyAll the time I was in Sussex, I didnt find a single coin, let alone, a penny - as I was leaving to board the train, I found a US Penny. heh. no pics though... Cant say if it was a lucky day, as the trains were cancelled due to flooding on the line! Then I had a 5 hour train journey.

properties.name: Freetown
properties.description: Posted by Daddy No pennies - only Leones.

properties.name: Intersection Clark & Chicago
properties.description: Posted by Deb15.08.07 Picked this penny up from the street as I stepped off the NE corner of Chicago to cross Clark on my way back to work. It has seen the world - very worn with lots of scratches and rough places.

properties.name: Intersection of Clark & Lake, Chicago
properties.description: Posted by Deb25.8.07 - two lucky pennies at the same intersection. First on NE corner of Clark & Lake on the Clark St. sidewalk. The second at the top of the 1st escalator to the Clark/Lake El.

properties.name: Lucky Penny
properties.description: Posted by ChippyFound outside the bus stop, was too amazed to find it, plus, shy to ask the people waiting for a bus to take my photo with it. Very shiny new penny!

properties.name: Lucky Penny
properties.description: Posted by ChippyFound a penny (2p) outside St. Pancras Road.

properties.name: Lucky Penny
properties.description: Posted by ChippyFound outside the Somerfield Supermarket. Just as i found it, friend popped along, so he took a picture of me picking it up!

properties.name: Lucky Penny at Victoria Coach Station:
properties.description: Posted by Chippy 51.492670, -0.149990 Found whilst waiting for 3 hrs for bus to leeds... was there underfoot

properties.name: Lucky Penny, outside Leeds Arts Centre
properties.description: Posted by Chippy Found this as i was walking past the Leeds City Art Centre. gleaming it was (photo to follow)

properties.name: Ridgeland & South Blvd parking lot
properties.description: Posted by Deb27.8.07 - Parked Maus (my car) in his daytime spot and found my first lucky penny of the day.

properties.name: chicago, river north
properties.description: Posted by Deb21.08.07 lucky penny found at NE corner of chicago & franklin (franklin sidewalk)

properties.name: lucky penny
properties.description: Posted by Chippy found outside curry house in bradford

properties.name: lucky penny
properties.description: Posted by Chippy found just in the entrance to mac ds

properties.name: lucky penny :)
